It had been some time since Goku had died, and life at the Son household had taken a turn for the worst. Gohan and the other Z-Warriors had gone off planet to save the universe, again, and would not be back for at least another month; leaving Chi Chi alone with an infant Goten. It was during this time when a group of criminals began to extort the people in the mountain community. They threatened everyone unless they were paid for "protection", and those who refused found themselves without a house or in the hospital.

At first, the martial artist housewife tried to resist. When they appeared on her doorstep she sent the first few soaring through the air, but the others proved to have a great deal of training. Chi Chi fought hard, but was defeated by the highly skilled enforcers of the gang. She was knocked out by a blow to the head and woke up with a note pinned to her door, warning her that if she didn't pay them the next time, they would get serious.

Worried, but unwilling to cave in to the pressure, and traveled to Bulma's home in hopes of a solution. With her husband and son dead and away respectively, and another son too young to speak or walk, she was put into a spot that she didn't think she could get out of alone, but Chi Chi knew that if anyone could help her it was Bulma.

Chi Chi arrived at her long time associate's house the next day, Goten was left with her father for the time being for his safety. She was quickly welcomed and stated her situation to Bulma, holding back her tears as she did.

"Why don't you ask your father, or Master Roshi for help? Wouldn't that be the more prudent thing to do?"

While she could ask assistance from her father or Master Roshi, but those crooks threatened her and her family, and she wasn't going to let that go unchallenged, and she let Bulma know this. While she explained her eyes narrowed and her hands clenched tightly, shaking slightly in anger.

"That's why I need your help, Bulma. I figured that you would be the person to see to get something I could use to beat them and take them down for good."

Bulma thought what she had on hand that could be of use. Any explosives or projectiles were a bad idea, they could cause accidental damage to the surrounding area, something she knew Chi Chi didn't want to happen. Even stun weapons would require her to leave herself open while she used them. No, gadgets like that would not do, but she remembered something that she had put on hold a few years ago.

Following her time on Namek, Bulma had set to work on a device that would make sure she was never so vulnerable again. This new device only needed its power source adjusted and it would be fully operational. Once worn it would increase the size, strength, and density of the musculature of its wearer.

"Alright, Chi Chi, I do have something that could work. I'll need a little time to finish it, but when it's done you will have strength enough to crush steel and a body that can take artillery fire. All you'll need to do is strap it to your wrist and turn it on."

The green haired scientist excused herself and went to make the finishing touches on her invention. Twenty minutes later she returned, with a watch-like device in hand, made of material similar to Saiyan armor, tough and flexible in order to fit the wearer when in use.

143311.title: Hatsune Miku

choices: During the workout, after drinking the shake...
A week later, the first photos...
1433111.content:
Hatsune Miku looked at the offered contract the agent had given her with a bit of apprehension. The agent's company was one who made healthier alternatives to most nutritional products preached by companies such as GNC, and who had their stores stocked full of chemical compounds, natural, unnatural and otherwise noted. She wasn't one in particular to work out, although she exercised often in order to keep her trim figure. Bodybuilding, for good reason, just never appealed to her. The company, Natural Growth LTD, however, was proposing something very interesting to her, something that might break that limit on herself. "So...you want me to promote one of your products by using it for a month. And show how much of an improvement in my body it gives in comparison to someone taking one of the normal compounds?"

The rather proper-dressed agent smiled warmly, nodding after sweating bullets this entire time wondering if she was going to take their proposal seriously. Wiping his brow a little, he began to explain. "Yes, Miss Hatsune. See, we're trying to expand our business here, from a smaller shop to one that can actually be stocked at places like GNC. Our product is wholesome, without being enriched or having nasty side effects. All we're asking you to do is take a dose a day for a month, lift weights and work your body, and then give us pictures of your improvement every week during that month. That is all. We've tailored an outfit to fit your tastes and with fabric that will suit your growing form, however fit or big it gets from your training, and we will provide any amenities necessary. We are successful in our endeavour. We would just like to be able to branch out from our small offices into something bigger." He waited for a moment with another smile before opening up a suitcase he brought with him, which contained the product that he was promoting. "This is our newest lineup...Bulk-UP, a naturally enhanced milkshake for building muscle. Not the best of names, of course, but it sells well enough. It comes in several flavors. You don't have to try all the flavors, but you can pick which ones you want."

With a soft click, the suitcase was opened and turned to Miku, whose aqua eyes roamed over the shakes sitting in neat little rows. There were four flavors; chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, and mint, all of which where contained in these bottles shaped like slight hourglasses. They were quite thick too; each one was said to contain about 20 ounces of the stuff, and upon picking one up she found it was rather heavy. Looking up at the agent, the Vocaloid put the bottle back down, looking at the month's case of Bulk-UP, "So this is it then? No strings attached, nothing else? Just work out once a day after drinking a shake?"

"That is correct. We'll pay for any amenities, any issues you have, and give you a nice, tax-free lump sum of ten thousand US dollars to your name. And any likenesses we use of you for posters and advertising will give you bonus royalties long after you've left our service. And just in case, note any strangeness. If anything crops up, stop taking the product with no penalties," he finished, holding is breath for the outcome.

Weighing the options in her hand, considering that this might end up a considerable alteration in her body, Miku once again read through the contract, noting that they would pay for any damages that she incurred at no expense to herself. Knowing that this was quite a risk, and yet, somehow feeling like this is an opportunity that she shouldn't miss, maybe for something exciting, the idol nodded, grinning at the agent as she signed the contract. "You have yourself a deal!"

He breathed a sigh of relief, taking the contract from her and smiling widely. Standing up, he bowed to her politely, leaving the briefcase with all the Bulk-Up shakes inside. "Thank you very much, Miss Hatsune! Pleasure doing business with you, and we hope to hear from you soon!" He let himself out the door, and within a few moments, he was gone, heading back to the corporate headquarters with good news. Giggling a little at his exit, she reached down, picking out one of the shakes, and for the first time noticing that there was a workout outfit for her embedded in the top of the suitcase.It was a lovely aqua and black leotard, with black, toeless thigh highs with aqua hems around the top and the toe and heel sections.

"Guess they were more serious than I thought...might as well give it my all!" she grins a little, wondering what she got herself into this time. She had some strange contracts before, most of which she got out of, but this one was a bit tamer and yet at the same time stranger than those. Miku could only wonder where this could take her as she took the drink in hand, heading to change and head into the room where most of the Vocaloids' workout equipment was kept; the home gym.
1433111.title: A New Opportunity?

choices: She calls the company about the incident
14331111.content:
Dressed in the new outfit given to her by Natural Growth, Miku wandered into the gym, feeling the strange, new fabric shifting across her skin as she moved. It tickled a little, the texture of the fabric something completely unknown to her, sending shivers down her spine as it slid across her skin. Suppressing a giggle in this strange, new wardrobe, she wandered into the home gym, turning on the lights and exposing a plethora of equipment, from cardio machines such as treadmills and ellipticals to full blown weight lifting sets and entire racks dedicated to weight training. There were even special places for Gakupo to practice swordsmanship, and for the girls to normally take yoga or other supposedly less-intensive workouts. But that wasn't what Miku wanted this time. To make this work, this contract, she had to think like a bodybuilder and as such the weights were the first thing on her mind. walking over to them and looking at the great round disks that comprised them, she furrowed her brow. "I guess I'll have to figure out where I'm at here...probably not too far up there...oh! But first, the shake."

Taking the mint-flavored shake she brought with her, she popped the lid and started to chug, gulping down the rather delicious, thick contents as if it were water. The taste was amazing for one of these health shakes; they didn't usually taste like the real thing! But no, this Bulk-UP shake tasted like it was fresh out of the ice cream shoppe. It was amazing...and before she knew it, the deliciously thick shake was gone. Pouting a little, she put the empty bottle in the nearby trash, blowing a lock of her loose aqua hair out of her face before stepping onto the workout mats. A bit nervous about having never done this before, she went over to the weight rack and took out two ten pound dumbells, hefting them in each of her arms and feeling their weight. Clutching their handles gently, she started to pump, the feeling completely unfamiliar to her. It was something unnatural, more reserved for those fitness freaks Miku had seen before on TV. Yet here she was, doing it for a contract.

The first minute or so of the exercise went without incident. She could feel the burn, the weights driving her underworked muscles to their limits, the idol already starting to grunt a little at the effort of each bicep curl. Fingers gripped the handles stronger, trying hard not to let go of the weights as she worked. IT was when she was about five minutes in that things started to change. Firstly, the pain vanished. Her soreness disappeared almost instantly, and instead, it felt better. The burn was still there, but it wasn't a harsh burn; it was hot, and tingled in a good way that made her purse her lips and coo. Shivering about for a minute, she groaned as she continued to pump, the warm feeling moving from her arms to her whole body. Second, as her aqua eyes opened, she watched her arms. They began to stretch, and grow, and suddenly before she knew it they were already quite defined. The rest of her body was like that too, growing more and more toned every second the longer she pumped.

And it had only been fifteen minutes since she drank the shake. Yelping at the growth as she looked at herself in the mirror, she dropped the weights with a clatter, breathing hard. This wasn't natural...to grow this fast. and to feel so good. Glancing at her new, fit body, she gave an exasperated sigh. "Oh...no..."
